title: Neutraface Condensed?!
content:
I just got the new Communication Arts issue in the mail and there was this snazzy ad for House Industries. Most of the typefaces looked familiar, except for a newly slimmed-down Neutraface. Something new coming?   
   
 ![House Ad](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907053610im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/30/34348.jpg)

 [‹ Good type?](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907053610/http:/www.typophile.com/node/4421 "Go to previous forum topic") [Guaran ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907053610/http:/www.typophile.com/node/4488 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Eric Gordon

comments.content: Good question. Give the House crew a call -- probably your best bet for a straight answer.
